title: Ukraine Changes Everything
sub_head: Europe’s long failure to deter Putin was the equivalent of ‘defund the police.’
body:
Vladimir Putin’s war on Ukraine is a “this changes everything” event. 9/11 was a “this changes everything” event. They happen, and at that moment most sentient people recognize that the way we lived before is going to need adjustment.
Europeans—from the island of Britain to the border between Poland and Ukraine—obviously see Mr. Putin has changed their world.
